lead_paragraph: The Florida developer in line to purchase the former Revel Casino Hotel in Atlantic City says in court filings that the auction for the property wasn't run fairly and he wants an $8 million discount.

headline.main: Potential Revel Casino Buyer Wants Discount
headline.print_headline: Potential Revel Casino Buyer Wants Discount
